publisherList.name: Morning Brew
publisherList.shortDesc: Got five minutes? We can make you smarter.
publisherList.longDesc: Morning Brew is the media company redefining the business news landscape through approachable, digestible—and not to brag—downright funny content. Across newsletters, podcasts, social media, and events, we reach an audience of over 3 million future and current business leaders.

publisherList.name: Mostly Sane
publisherList.shortDesc: Access 100s of Tutorials & Templates to Help You Make What You Want. Join Now!
publisherList.longDesc: In the context of branding, a tagline is a memorable motto or phrase that’s designed to serve as a permanent expression of your company’s greater purpose and mission. Taglines are long-lasting, instantly recognizable with your brand and have the goal of both attracting customers & remaining top of mind with your existing audience.
